    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107236</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107236</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202731</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Trees in Your Own Backyard</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bäume in Ihrem eigenen Hinterhof</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arbres dans votre propre arrière-cour</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Árvores em seu próprio quintal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Alberi nel vostro proprio cortile</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δέντρα στο Κατώφλι σας</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Árboles en su propio patio trasero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This activity lets students discover the benefits of urban forests by looking at trees on the schoolyard. Students will read a synopsis of the 400-year Social Sciences of communal forests, survey their schoolyard trees, and draft a schoolyard tree ordinance.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Aktivität läßt Kursteilnehmer den Nutzen 
der städtischen Wälder entdecken, indem sie Bäume auf dem 
schoolyard betrachtet. Kursteilnehmer lesen eine Synopse der 
Sozialwissenschaften 400-year der Kommunalwälder, überblicken ihre 
schoolyard Bäume und zeichnen einen schoolyard Baumbefehl.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette activité laisse des étudiants découvrir 
les avantages des forêts urbaines en regardant des arbres sur la 
cour de récréation. Les étudiants liront une synthèse des sciences 
400-year sociales des forêts communales, examineront leurs arbres de 
cour de récréation, et dessineront une ordonnance d'arbre de cour de récréation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta atividade deixa estudantes descobrir os 
benefícios de florestas urbanas olhando árvores no schoolyard. 
Os estudantes lerão um synopsis das ciências 400-year sociais 
de florestas communal, examinarão suas árvores do schoolyard, e 
esboçarão um ordinance da árvore do schoolyard.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa attività lascia gli allievi scoprire i 
benefici delle foreste urbane guardando gli alberi sullo schoolyard. 
Gli allievi leggeranno una sinossi delle scienze sociali 
400-year delle foreste comunali, esamineranno i loro alberi di 
schoolyard e disegneranno un'ordinanza dell'albero di schoolyard.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η δραστηριότητα αφήνει τους σπουδαστές να 
ανακαλύψουν τα οφέλη των αστικών δασών με την εξέταση τα δέντρα 
schoolyard. Οι σπουδαστές θα διαβάσουν μια σύνοψη των 
κοινωνικών επιστημών 400-έτους των κοινοτικών δασών, θα 
ερευνήσουν schoolyard τους τα δέντρα, και θα συντάξουν μια 
schoolyard διάταξη δέντρων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta actividad deja a estudiantes descubrir las 
ventajas de bosques urbanos mirando árboles en el schoolyard. 
Los estudiantes leerán una sinopsis de las ciencias sociales 
400-year de bosques comunales, examinarán sus árboles del 
schoolyard, y bosquejarán una ordenanza del árbol del schoolyard.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:LUCY LAFFITTE

        </lifeCycle>

        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>

        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
